sentences.en: He thought the letter cowardly and hypocritical.
sentences.cn: 他认为这封信写得既怯懦又伪善.

sentences.en: I hate people striking attitudes most, and find them extremely hypocritical.
sentences.cn: 我最讨厌那些爱做秀的人了, 感觉他们特别虚伪.

sentences.en: I live very hypocritical, pretending to have their own very happy.
sentences.cn: 所以我活的很虚伪, 假装自己过的很开心.

sentences.en: I removed the hypocritical smile, put on a tired face.
sentences.cn: 我卸下了虚伪的微笑, 摆出一张疲倦的脸.

sentences.en: I would just like to say that this is the most hypocritical thing I have ever heard in my life.
sentences.cn: 我只想说这是我这辈子听说过的最虚伪的事情。

sentences.en: If someone is being hypocritical then it is fair to expose that.
sentences.cn: 如果有人虚伪矫饰，那就应该暴露他的真面目。

sentences.en: It laid bare the hypocritical apologies of economists.
sentences.cn: 它揭穿了经济学家的虚伪的粉饰.

sentences.en: It would be hypocritical to say I travel at 70 mph simply because that is the law.
sentences.cn: 如果仅仅因为法律规定的时速是70英里我就说自己的行驶时速是70英里，那就太虚伪了。

sentences.en: It would be hypocritical to say I travel at 70mph simply because that is the law.
sentences.cn: 如果因为法律规定的时速是70英里我就说自己的车速是这么高，那就是虚伪了。

sentences.en: It's hypocritical to say one thing and do another.
Sincere expressions are much more valuable than empty and hypocritical imitations.
sentences.cn: 真诚的表达较空洞,虚伪的模仿更为可贵.

sentences.en: The Heidlers are an unpleasantly hypocritical pair.
sentences.cn: 海德勒夫妇很虚伪，很让人讨厌。

sentences.en: Their marriage reforms, assumes a light and hypocritical companionship.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻生活却从此变了样, 而变为一种浮而不实的伴侣关系.

sentences.en: This hypocritical bureaucrat has done many bad things secretly.
sentences.cn: 这些虚伪的官绅背地里做尽了坏事.

sentences.en: What could be more amusing than the public exposure of hypocritical sinners?
sentences.cn: 是的,每个人都喜欢丑闻,就算你不喜欢最新的也没关系.

sentences.en: With hypocritical mockers in feasts, they gnashed upon me with their teeth.
sentences.cn: 诗35:16他们如同席上好嬉笑的狂妄人、向我咬牙.

trans.tran_cn: 伪善的，虚伪的，伪善者的，言不由衷的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a way that is different from what you claim to believe – used to show disapproval
